p: Natural killer cells play an important role in innate immunity by recognizing major histocompatibility class I-negative target cells, which can escape immune surveillance by cytotoxic T cells. A Cochrane review of five RCTs using Ganoderma lucidum as complementary cancer therapy showed that patients in the verum group had increased natural killer cell activity and increased levels of CD3, CD4 and CD8, leukocytes, and CD4/CD8 ratio ( Jin et al., 2016).
